title: Thai green rice
description: This, thankfully, is a Thai recipe that doesn't require all the speciality ingredients that are sometimes so elusive. The list of ingredients seems rather long, but it is made in moments and has a lovely fragrant flavour.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 9in/23cm frying pan with a close-fitting lid.
ingredients: 2 large or 3 medium-sized fresh green chillies
1½ tbsp groundnut or other flavourless oil
2 medium onions, peeled and finely sliced
4oz/110g fresh peas, or frozen and defrosted
1½ level tsp salt, or to taste
